rcompass 0.0.3

    • Use Case 01

Get experiment Accessid and name

Source: R/queries.R
get_experiments.Rd

use get_available_compendia to check all the available compendia

get_experiments(compendium = "vespucci", sampleName = NULL)

Arguments

compendium

A string - the selected compendium
sampleName

A string - if NULL(default) returns all available experiments ids for the selected compendium

Value

A data.frame with experimentAccessId and esperimentName

Examples

get_experiments()
#>     experimentAccessId
